name: Woocommerce simple wishlist
author: Query Solutions LTD

sections.description:
Improve your conversion rate by adding your customers the option to create their own wishlist.
This plugin will allow you to add the wishlist functionality to your woocommerce store.

This plugin is 100% WPML ready

This plugin will allow you to override its template files:

To override button template file just add your file:
theme-directory/woocommerce/wishlist-add-button.php

To override the wishlist template just add your file:
theme-directory/woocommerce/wishlist-page.php

The plugin also allows filters/actions usage

Usage

Simply go to Woocommerce -> settings -> WC Wishlist

  1. You can choose which page will display the wishlist
  2. Select either users can add products to the cart from the wishlist
  3. Select other text strings and other options
  4. Save
sections.installation:
Installing Simple Woocommerce wishlist can be done either by searching for Simple Woocommerce wishlist via the Plugins > Add New screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the Plugins > Add New > Upload screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  4. Visit the settings screen and configure, as desired.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing Simple Woocommerce wishlist can be done either by searching for Simple Woocommerce wishlist via the Plugins > Add New screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the Plugins > Add New > Upload screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  4. Visit the settings screen and configure, as desired.
